long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your daily tasks and boost your productivity with Taskly, the ultimate task management tool directly integrated into your browser. Taskly is designed to help you organize, track, and complete your tasks effortlessly, whether you are managing work projects, personal goals, or day-to-day tasks. With a user-friendly interface, Taskly brings full control over your time management and ensures that you can keep track of your progress.

Taskly offers real-time task tracking by allowing you to start a timer for each task and monitor how long you spend on it. You can easily organize tasks into categories such as work or personal, making it easier to manage various aspects of your life. The tool provides both daily and weekly views, helping you plan ahead and visualize your schedule.

With Taskly, you can track your task completion rate and compare the time you’ve allocated to tasks with the actual time spent. You can quickly add tasks using simple input fields for task name, date, and estimated time, making it convenient to schedule tasks on the go. If needed, tasks can be edited, time spent can be adjusted, and you can easily mark tasks as complete.

Taskly also provides detailed progress reports, summarizing your task history, time spent, completion rates, and task distribution across various categories. Whether you’re a professional managing work projects, a student tracking study sessions, or someone organizing personal tasks, Taskly helps you stay productive and focused by giving you a clear overview of your tasks and time management.
